channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- NetWeaver AS ABAP and ABAP Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-23854|2023-04-11T21:21:48.072Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.
